channel.title: Error
channel.description:
Anyone know how to fix it? [code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I have variables set(correctly) and i have JDK1.6.0_14 And my compiler code is: [code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
Well i get the same error whatever compiler i try i still get same error
I know thers compile section but no1 answers me there. But if u realy wanna, fine delete it but i prefer help ;D Thanks!

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Ramps Ramps
item.description:
@Ramps wrote:

Anyone know how to fix it?

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

I have variables set(correctly) and i have JDK1.6.0_14
And my compiler code is:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Well i get the same error whatever compiler i try i still get same error

I know thers compile section but no1 answers me there. But if u realy wanna, fine delete it but i prefer help ;D
Thanks!
